member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPE_COUNT
member.summary: Indicates a count of protected resource session types.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPE_COUNT.NodeIndex
member.summary: An input parameter which, in multi-adapter operation, indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPE_COUNT.Count
member.summary: An output parameter containing the number of protected resource session types supported by the driver.
